quotes.quote: To him that you tell your secret you resign your liberty.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Three may keep a secret, if two of them are dead.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: No one gossips about other people's secret virtues.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The best way to divulge a secret is to tell someone not to say anything about it.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: If you have to keep something secret it's because you shouldn't be doing it in the first place!
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Look in the mirror. The face that pins you with its double gaze reveals a chastening secret.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The first rule of life is to reveal nothing, to be exceptionally cautious in what you say, in whatever company you may find yourself. If you have a secret, you have only to whisper it to your dearest friend with the strictest injunction that it will go no further, and within half a day the story is all over town, and when you do make what would seem to be a perfectly sensible remark, you will find it reported in the most grotesque form, thus incurring no end of criticism to rebound upon you.
quotes.author: Kenneth Tynan

quotes.quote: Trade your secrets and become who you are.
quotes.author: Saint Jerome

quotes.quote: There are no secrets better kept than the secrets that everybody guesses.
quotes.author: Scipione Alberti

quotes.quote: If you reveal your secrets to the wind you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees.
A neurosis is a secret that you don't know you are keeping.
The face is the mirror of the mind, and eyes without speaking confess the secrets of the heart.
Secret thoughts and open countenance will go safely over the whole world.
